analysis.description:
JungleScratch.submit (/unique_chucks/15/0x8cd06b5c327b0e277a7f6b08b9acea4d8ee36180.sol#70-83) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(TicketPool[secretKey_D_hash].Time == 0)

JungleScratch.submit (/unique_chucks/15/0x8cd06b5c327b0e277a7f6b08b9acea4d8ee36180.sol#70-83) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(TicketPool[secretKey_D_hash].Time == 0) (/unique_chucks/15/0x8cd06b5c327b0e277a7f6b08b9acea4d8ee36180.sol#73-74)

JungleScratch.award (/unique_chucks/15/0x8cd06b5c327b0e277a7f6b08b9acea4d8ee36180.sol#83-172) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- game_result != 0 (/unique_chucks/15/0x8cd06b5c327b0e277a7f6b08b9acea4d8ee36180.sol#152-164)
	- address(this).balance >= game_result && TicketPool[secretKey_D_hash].Buyer.send(game_result) (/unique_chucks/15/0x8cd06b5c327b0e277a7f6b08b9acea4d8ee36180.sol#153-163)

JungleScratch.chargeOwe (/unique_chucks/15/0x8cd06b5c327b0e277a7f6b08b9acea4d8ee36180.sol#195-204) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- address(this).balance >= TicketPool[secretKey_D_hash].Result (/unique_chucks/15/0x8cd06b5c327b0e277a7f6b08b9acea4d8ee36180.sol#199-204)
	- require(bool)(TicketPool[secretKey_D_hash].isPlay) (/unique_chucks/15/0x8cd06b5c327b0e277a7f6b08b9acea4d8ee36180.sol#198)
	- require(bool)(! TicketPool[secretKey_D_hash].isPay) (/unique_chucks/15/0x8cd06b5c327b0e277a7f6b08b9acea4d8ee36180.sol#197)
	- require(bool)(TicketPool[secretKey_D_hash].Result != 0) (/unique_chucks/15/0x8cd06b5c327b0e277a7f6b08b9acea4d8ee36180.sol#198-199)
